name: ProGrad Talent Solutions Pvt Ltd
description: ProGrad aims to bridge the skill gap in the Indian IT space. We enable tech organisations reach their talent objectives with a range of tailored talent hiring and training solutions. We also help job-seekers and students build industry grade tech skills and launch dream careers
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Made to order tech order
ShortDescription: ProGrad enables tech organisations to on-board skilled, ready-to-deploy entry level candidates.

Highlights.name: Large Talent Pool
Highlights.description: Talent from different backgrounds across all experience levels

Highlights.name: Tailored Programs
Highlights.description: Talent training to meet unique business needs with work culture in mind

Highlights.name: Work Readiness
Highlights.description: Explore workplace realities with training led by “Developer turned Mentors”

enhanced_description: ProGrad Talent Solutions Pvt Ltd is an HR technology company focused on bridging the skill gap within the Indian IT space. It provides tailored talent hiring and training solutions specifically for tech organizations, helping them achieve their talent objectives and onboard skilled, ready-to-deploy candidates. ProGrad also assists job-seekers and students in building industry-grade tech skills to launch their careers. The company's core services include Pan India sourcing, a strong focus on diversity, and fast, on-demand talent solutions. They boast access to a large talent pool from diverse backgrounds and experience levels, offering tailored training programs designed to meet unique business needs and ensure work readiness, delivered by 'Developer turned Mentors'.
key_use_cases: Talent hiring solutions for tech organizations
Tailored training solutions for tech organizations
Onboarding skilled and ready-to-deploy entry-level candidates
Building industry-grade tech skills for job-seekers and students
Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
Hiring top talent faster and more efficiently
Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency
Custom talent program development based on business needs
competitive_advantages: Tailored talent hiring and training programs
Training led by 'Developer turned Mentors' ensuring work readiness
Access to a large talent pool across experience levels
Focus on bridging skill gaps in the Indian IT space
roi_benefits: Reduced skill gap in the workforce
Optimized learning outcomes for new hires
deployment_options: SaaS (for implied software components like recruiting and onboarding software)
Service-delivery (for talent acquisition and training programs)
scalability_features: Support for Global and Large Enterprises
Management of a large talent pool
